body_html:
Having very similar issues as well:

  • cifar10 often freezes right after or during local3 (first fc after the two convs)
  • Now did this right after or during the first conv:
    E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_event.cc:49] Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_ILLEGAL_ADDRESS
    F tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_event_mgr.cc:198] Unexpected Event status: 1
    Aborted (core dumped)
    Havent been able to run training for longer than half an hour. Is there a solution for this in the meantime. I understand this might be solved, but was not really planned for.

Thx

body:
Having very similar issues as well:
- cifar10 often freezes right after or during local3 (first fc after the two convs)
- Now did this right after or during the first conv:
  E tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_event.cc:49] Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_ILLEGAL_ADDRESS
  F tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_event_mgr.cc:198] Unexpected Event status: 1
  Aborted (core dumped)
  Havent been able to run training for longer than half an hour. Is there a solution for this in the meantime. I understand this might be solved, but was not really planned for. 

Thx
